entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
